name: narcissistic
description: A class president election becomes a battlefield when Kelly, facing unexpected competition from former friend Sophia, launches a calculated campaign of body shaming and social exclusion. What begins as subtle undermining escalates into public humiliation posts targeting Sophia's appearance and family background. Kelly leverages her social status and perfectionist image to rally supporters, while accomplices like Sarah and Michael amplify the attacks through likes and comments. The scenario explores narcissistic bullying driven by power-seeking and ego protection, as Kelly's grandiose self-image feels threatened by Sophia's academic achievements and genuine campaign platform. Bystanders must navigate complex social hierarchies and past friendships.
